DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Efficacy Safety Pitavastatin Simvastatin
DOC.criteria: Males female ( 1875 year age ) At least two cardiovascular disease risk factor Must follow restrictive diet Diagnosis primary hypercholesterolemia combine dyslipidemia Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Conditions may cause secondary dyslipidemia Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Abnormal pancreatic , liver renal function Abnormal serum creatine kinase ( CK ) prespecified level
